statements.statement: SELECT PO_SEQ ,b.MATER_CD ,b.MATER_NM_EN AS MATER_NM ,b.ATTR1 AS MODEL_NM ,b.UNIT ,RECEIPT_QTY ,'F' as chk FROM TB_RECEIPT_MASTER M, TB_RECEIPT_DETAIL D, TB_MATER_INFO B WHERE m.company_cd = d.company_cd AND m.po_no = d.po_no AND m.receipt_seq = d.receipt_seq AND d.company_cd = b.company_cd and d.mater_cd = b.mater_cd AND M.COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND M.PO_NO = ${poNo} AND D.RECEIPT_SEQ = ${receiptSeq}
SELECT DETAIL_CD PLANT_CD ,DETAIL_CD_NM_KR ,DETAIL_CD_NM_EN ,DETAIL_CD_NM_LO FROM TB_COMM_CD_DETAIL WHERE GROUP_CD = '2008' AND COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd}
